title: Bluetooth disconnects automatically. It is unstable.
content:
When listening to music via bluetooth headsets, it gets disconnected automatically.
Later, on manually connecting it again, it would work.

Update : I have 2 wifi routers, one on ground floor and another of second floor. I have noticed it happens when phone automatically disconnects from one Wifi network and connects to another. Bluetooth too get disconnected but never reconnects.

This is super annoying.
